product_name: SmartWool Porchini Scrunch Socks - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Hitting just a bit higher than your ankle, the SmartWool Porchini Scrunch socks have a slim, light design that is great for everyday, warm-weather wear. Made from soft merino wool blended with nylon, these socks wick moisture away from your feet, keeping them dry and cool in the summer and warm in the winter. Elastane stretch helps keep socks in place and provides additional support at the arches. Strategic mesh zones maximize ventilation. SmartWool socks are guaranteed not to itch and can be repeatedly washed and dried without shrinking. Closeout.
